question:
Consider the following statements about Adaptation Fund (AF):
  1. It is set up under the Kyoto Protocol of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).
  2. The World Bank serves as the trustee of the Adaptation Fund
  3. The Adaptation Fund is managed by the Adaptation Fund Board (AFB) which meets thrice a year
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. Adaptation Fund is set up under the Kyoto Protocol of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC). <u>Second statement is correct. </u>The World Bank serves as the trustee of the Adaptation Fund. <u>Third statement is correct</u>. The Adaptation Fund is managed by the Adaptation Fund Board (AFB) which meets thrice a year. The AFB is composed of 16 members and 16 alternates representing Annex I countries, Non-Annex I countries, Least Developed Countries (LDCs), Small Island Developing States (SIDSs), and regional constituencies. The Adaptation Fund is financed with a share of proceeds from the clean development mechanism (CDM) project activities and other sources of funding.
